name: productkit
description: A growing collection of Claude plugins for product teams — PMs, designers, engineers, researchers. Strategic thinking partners, not template fillers. Install one or all — each plugin works independently.

plugins.name: strategic-pm
plugins.description: Strategic PM co-pilot — PRDs, roadmaps, competitive analysis, user research synthesis, OKRs, GTM planning, stakeholder navigation, and a full AI Product Management Playbook.
